name: Grave Composer Music Module
summary: Learn about .WOW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Grave Composer is an old music-tracking program that allowed MS-DOS users to create music. It is discontinued and no longer available for download.

Since the software is no longer in use, WOW files are rare. However, music-tracking enthusiasts may have old WOW files on their computers or share WOW music modules they created previously with the Grave Composer.

instructions: You can open a WOW file with OpenMPT (Windows) by selecting File â†’ Open. Once you open the WOW file with OpenMPT, the program converts it to a supported modern module format, such as OpenMPT (.MPTM) or MIDI (.MID).
